meanings.definition: A protein found in milk and cheese.
meanings.sent1: Casein is a protein that can be found in milk.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating foods rich in casein like cheese.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to steal the casein from the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pure and white as casein.
meanings.sent5: The casein in the milk gives it a creamy texture.

meanings.definition: A type of glue made from casein.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used casein to glue the pieces of wood together.
meanings.sent2: The casein glue dried quickly and securely held the frame.
meanings.sent3: The children mistakenly thought the casein glue was frosting.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as casein adhesive.
meanings.sent5: The casein adhesive bonded the broken pieces seamlessly.

meanings.definition: A substance used in the production of certain plastics.
meanings.sent1: Casein is an essential component in making some plastics.
meanings.sent2: The factory workers carefully measured the casein for the plastic production.
meanings.sent3: The artist sculpted a miniature model using casein as a base.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a silhouette against the casein-colored sky.
meanings.sent5: The casein added durability to the plastic material.
